main.sql: SELECT cast(Transliter(fr.fio) as varchar(50)) as EngFio , cast(Transliter(fr.town) as varchar(103))as engTown , cast(Transliter(fr.Coach) as varchar(50))as engCoach , (c.date_begin - fr.bithdate)/365 as age , fr.* , r.sname as rname , loc.zr , loc.createtime , loc.id_stream FROM finalreport( %IDC% ) fr left join Lifter_on_competition loc on loc.id_lifter_compet = fr.loc left join Competit C on c.id_compet = loc.id_compet left join range r on r.id_range = c.id_range WHERE loc.id_lifter = %IDL% AND loc.ID_AGECL = %IDAC%
